name: Super Catscape
description: Super Catscape is a 2D sidescroller retro platformer about Kim, a brave kitten who is abducted by strange alien creatures, along with other pets. Kim used to live with his beloved friend, Dr Sam, who takes care of him. Dr Sam created a formula to enhance regular milk, which seems to have provided Kim with superpowers and great intelligence. Now Kim has to find a way to escape from the strange alien planet, saving all captive pets in his way back to Earth.
